text: Happy Valley Terminus () is a tram stop and one of the seven termini of Hong Kong Tramways, a double-decker tram system. Located in Happy Valley, it is one of the system's two termini in the Wan Chai District on Hong Kong Island. ==Routes== *Happy Valley ↔ Kennedy Town *Happy Valley ↔ Shau Kei Wan ==References== Category:Hong Kong Tramways stops
title: Happy Valley Terminus
